Author: snefferu
Text: Good incentives, Realistic goals, compromise, determination, honesty and a good support network

Author: SubBiscuit
Text: I asked my boyfriend to hold me to my calorie goal. He almost never has to bring it up but knowing that I'm doing it for someone else, not myself, makes it easier. When I have really bad days and want to restrict, I know he'd be there for me and see if maybe I could do just a little juice, or maybe an almond.  It's almost like since I know hed support me I try to do what hed do to help me.
